named-query.name: DbEntityAudit.getByEntityIdActionStartTimeStartIdx
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM DbEntityAudit obj WHERE obj.entityId = :entityId AND obj.action = :action AND obj.eventTime >= :eventTimeStart AND obj.eventIndex >= :eventIdxStart ORDER BY obj.eventTime DESC, obj.eventIndex DESC

named-query.name: DbEntityAudit.getByEntityIdStartTimeStartIdx
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM DbEntityAudit obj WHERE obj.entityId = :entityId AND obj.eventTime >= :eventTimeStart AND obj.eventIndex >= :eventIdxStart ORDER BY obj.eventTime DESC, obj.eventIndex DESC

named-query.name: JanusStore.getIdByName
named-query.query: SELECT s.id FROM JanusStore s WHERE s.name = :name

named-query.name: JanusKey.getIdByStoreIdAndName
named-query.query: SELECT k.id FROM JanusKey k WHERE k.storeId = :storeId AND k.name = :name

named-query.name: JanusKey.getKeysByStoreId
named-query.query: SELECT k.name FROM JanusKey k WHERE k.storeId = :storeId

named-query.name: JanusColumn.getColumnIdByKeyIdAndName
named-query.query: SELECT c.id FROM JanusColumn c WHERE c.keyId = :keyId AND c.name = :name

named-query.name: JanusColumn.updateById
named-query.query: UPDATE JanusColumn c SET c.val = :val WHERE c.id = :id

named-query.name: JanusColumn.updateByKeyIdAndName
named-query.query: UPDATE JanusColumn c SET c.val = :val WHERE c.keyId = :keyId AND c.name = :name

named-query.name: JanusColumn.deleteByKeyIdAndName
named-query.query: DELETE FROM JanusColumn c WHERE c.keyId = :keyId AND c.name = :name

named-query.name: JanusColumn.getValueByStoreIdKeyIdName
named-query.query: SELECT c.val FROM JanusColumn c WHERE c.keyId = :keyId AND c.name = :name

named-query.name: JanusColumn.getColumnsByKeyIdStartNameEndName
named-query.query: SELECT c.name, c.val FROM JanusColumn c WHERE c.keyId = :keyId AND c.name >= :startName AND c.name < :endName ORDER BY c.name

named-query.name: JanusColumn.getKeysByStoreIdColumnRange
named-query.query: SELECT k.id, k.name, c.name, c.val FROM JanusColumn c, JanusKey k WHERE k.storeId = :storeId AND c.keyId = k.id AND c.name >= :startName AND c.name < :endName ORDER BY k.name, c.name

named-query.name: JanusColumn.getKeysByStoreIdKeyRangeColumnRange
named-query.query: SELECT k.id, k.name, c.name, c.val FROM JanusColumn c, JanusKey k WHERE k.storeId = :storeId AND k.name >= :startKey AND k.name < :endKey AND c.keyId = k.id AND c.name >= :startName AND c.name < :endName ORDER BY k.name, c.name
